Berlin and Porto, Valencia and Copenhagen, Riga and Berlin, Riga and Copenhagen, Berlin and Copenhagen, Porto and Copenhagen, Berlin and Split, Porto and Valencia, Copenhagen and Split, Berlin and Valencia.
